name: Z shell
description: The Z shell (zsh) is a Unix shell that can be used as an interactive login shell and as a powerful command interpreter for shell scripting. Zsh is an extended Bourne shell with many improvements, including some features of Bash, ksh, and tcsh. This shell enhances the interactive use of shell and scripting capabilities, offering features like improved variable handling, programmable command-line completion, shell function, and command execution. It is particularly popular for its user-friendly enhancements in the shell environment and ability to adapt or configure to user preferences for a tailored workflow.
